backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining categories, channel management types, user profiles, access control, and basic profile CRUD with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON scaffold.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including hooks, components, pages, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router setup, application routes, and theme provider for the main React app.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Displays user name and Bacon Cash balance with a button linking to the purchase page.
Wrapper that restricts content to authenticated admin users and shows denial or loading states.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultGateD: Modal dialog prompting users to confirm adult content access with warning and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultRoute: Route guard that enforces adult-content consent using persistent consent state and a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Reusable screen showing an access denied message with navigation back home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Initial profile setup modal collecting a display name and creating a default user profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Conditional renderer that restricts UI based on authentication, admin status, and optional channel ownership.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Clickable RockHog TV logo that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/components/branding/Categor: Maps category names to icon paths and renders the appropriate image with fallback to music.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroBan: Displays a large hero image with headline and description overlay text.
frontend/src/components/channels/Channel: Shows a clickable channel card with thumbnail, title, category badge, and hover play overlay.
Dialog for creating or editing channels with fields for metadata and thumbnail upload; submits via hooks.
Renders a responsive grid of channel cards with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/channels/Thumbna: Provides image upload UI with progress tracking and thumbnail preview using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines main app layout with header, nav, footer, authentication-aware components, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Renders top navigation for main categories and a creator studio link when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/player/StreamEmb: Embeds a stream via iframe or raw embed code, supporting YouTube and Twitch URL conversion.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareButto: Share button using Web Share API with clipboard fallback and toast feedback.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/ai.ts: Empty placeholder file for AI logic.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/consta: Empty placeholder file for engine constants.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameLo: Empty placeholder for game loop implementation.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameSt: Empty placeholder for game state definitions.
Empty placeholder for engine type definitions.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useDesk: Empty placeholder for desktop control hooks.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useTouc: Empty placeholder for touch control hooks.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/Virtual: Empty placeholder for virtual control UI.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/BaconOpsMa: Empty placeholder for main menu UI.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/RoundOverl: Empty placeholder for round overlay UI.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/StatsPanel: Empty placeholder for stats panel UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdultGate.ts: Provides a hook to read, grant, and revoke adult consent stored in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Defines hooks to fetch the callerâ€™s user role and admin status using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing identity state, login, and logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react-query hooks for fetching and mutating channels, user profiles, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables, themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBaconCashRequest: Admin page to list and fulfill Bacon Cash requests with status indicators and actions.
frontend/src/pages/BaconOpsArenaPage.tsx: Empty page file reserved for the Bacon Ops Arena view.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHomePage.tsx: Renders the home browsing page with categories, hero banner, and recently added channels.
frontend/src/pages/BuyBaconCashPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to request Bacon Cash purchases and displays their past requests and current balance.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Shows all channels in a selected category, with adult content gated by AdultRouteGuard.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information with a mailto link to the owner's email address.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Lets authenticated users manage their channels, including creating, editing, deleting, and copying channel info.
frontend/src/pages/StreamDetailPage.tsx: Shows details and video embed for a specific stream, with edit and delete options for owners or admins.
frontend/src/utils/category.ts: Defines category constants, labels, and helper functions for retrieving category metadata and display names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, plugin extensions, custom colors, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, versioning, features, and architectural notes for RockHog TV.
